title: Three views from an ivory tower
creator_credit: University of California. Dept. of Theatre Arts. Motion Picture Division
brief_description: A lesser stone-poet; a scientific builder and the inventor of the ultimate weapon. Each in their own ivory tower thinks they have created their own ideal, and the others had nothing to do with “true creativity” - but they did! Music by Gerrit Bratt. Animation Workshop 1963.
